title: 求死亡不掉落MOD啊！！！不要指令
author: 匿名

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 3686&highlight=棺材
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 6169&highlight=尸体
不掉落做不到，不过你可以用这两个mod保留物品

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 都有指令了这种MOD早就消亡了吧
好像没有这种MOD把意义不大 /gamerule keepInventory true

replies.author: undefined
replies.txt_content:
死亡不掉落Mod无意义
/gamerule keepInventory true/false

replies.author: modpromulgator
replies.txt_content: 其实你完全可以下载墓穴mod 死后会生成墓穴 挖掉即可获得你的东西{:10_496:}
